header: God Commands That Babylon Be Taken

verse: The pronouncement concerning the wilderness of the sea:
For this is what the Lord says to me:
For this is what the Lord said to me: “In a year, as a hired worker would count it, all the splendor of Kedar will come to an end;
and the remainder of the number of bowmen, the warriors of the sons of Kedar, will be few; for the Lord God of Israel has spoken.”
